Hi, I'm Pratik half accountant half developer or as I like to call it Padawan in training to learn about the binary force. I live in the deep dish capital of the world Chicago. I still am a 10-key crunching vlookuping beast of an Accountant but my passion for technology led me to Dev Bootcamp where I had a chance to learn and utilize technology to disrupt the world; like the Taco Bell app! Other interests include investing and analyzing markets which is why I also have a B.S. in Finance; did someone say Fintech? Lighting round: my favorite color you should know by now is #00AEEF (like this background), I love pad thai and pho, and love to site see for thinking/inspiration. Feel free to contact me or read my TechCrunchesque blog (You are already on the site). Ok its just a basic blog but I shows some interesting concepts, tips, tricks, tutorials I have learned; and sometimes random life things. Oh and I love Taco Bell!

I am an accountant and web developer. I'm Indian, and live in Chicago enjoying the cities deep dish pizza offerings. Niles has been my home for over 20 years along with the snow and humidity. If I had a choice to visit any place over and over again it would be San Francisco; I just love the scenery and atmosphere of the west coast.


Growing up I played a ton of video games (FFVII/Unreal Tournament/MGS), followed the markets (T, VZ, MSFT buy and hold 4ever!), and loved technology(AIM was an essential means of communication as well as that annoying dial tone). In college I studied Finance and minored in Information Systems; then worked as an accountant for numerous years. Eventually, my passion for how technology helps change the world took over and I decided to learn how to code. I finished an intense 18 week web development bootcamp at Dev Bootcamp(final project).


I'm glad I learned how to code because it gave me the ability to help make a change in the world by contributing to applications that people depend on; whether it is used by hundreds or millions of people. Currently, I am working on some applications that I had always wanted to make(see list below) and also diving my brain into a plethora of new technologies. Always keep learning!

  • E-Commerce App (demo)

Oh and I love Taco Bell!
